1 CURRICULAM VITAE

PROFESSIONAL OBJECTIVES:

JOHN CRANE MIDDLE EAST .

John Crane is part of Smiths Group, a global technology business. John Crane designs and 
manufactures seals and associated products for pumps, compressors, mixers mainly for the Oil & Gas, Petrochemical, Pharmaceutic...
